Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LtTx-1a (latartoxin 1a; natural AMPs; spiders, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 4S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows poor similarity (31.9%) toAcidocin A.  A synthetic peptide corresponding to the C-terminal 21 amino acids is membrane active and can inhibit the growth of A. globiformis Ac-1112 and B. subtilis B-501 (MIC 3.1-6.2 uM). The gram stain of this bacterium can change from negative (growth early stage) to positive (30 h later).
Literature Information.Author: Kuzmenkov AI, Fedorova IM, Vassilevski AA, Grishin EV. 2013
Literature Information.Title: Cysteine-rich toxins from Lachesana tarabaevi spider venom with amphiphilic C-terminal segments
